message: Initial release of RISC-V instruction generator

Add support coverage flow for qrun, and minor fix for cov.py (#335)

* Ignore ucdb file of coverage

* cov.py: Minor fix for removing redundant code

* README.md: Add --isa for the example

The example does not work. It complains about requirement --isa:
ome/danghai/hhoangda/riscv-dv/yaml/simulator.yaml --so -o newtest --cov -tl /home/danghai/hhoangda/riscv-dv/yaml/cov_testlist.yaml --isa  -v -tn riscv_instr_cov_debug_test --steps gen --sim_opts "+num_of_iterations=20000" --target rv64gc  --log_suffix _0
Wed, 04 Dec 2019 04:24:40 lib.py:122   INFO     usage: run.py [-h] [--target TARGET] [-o O] [-tl TESTLIST] [-tn TEST]
              [--seed SEED] [-i ITERATIONS] [-si SIMULATOR] [--iss ISS] [-v]
              [--co] [--cov] [--so] [--cmp_opts CMP_OPTS]
              [--sim_opts SIM_OPTS] [--gcc_opts GCC_OPTS] [-s STEPS]
              [--lsf_cmd LSF_CMD] [--isa ISA] [-m MABI]
              [--gen_timeout GEN_TIMEOUT]
              [--end_signature_addr END_SIGNATURE_ADDR]
              [--iss_timeout ISS_TIMEOUT] [--iss_yaml ISS_YAML]
              [--simulator_yaml SIMULATOR_YAML] [--csr_yaml CSR_YAML]
              [--seed_yaml SEED_YAML] [-ct CUSTOM_TARGET]
              [-cs CORE_SETTING_DIR] [-ext USER_EXTENSION_DIR]
              [--asm_test ASM_TEST] [--log_suffix LOG_SUFFIX] [-bz BATCH_SIZE]
              [--stop_on_first_error]
run.py: error: argument --isa: expected one argument

Refactor the code for cov.py (#416)

* cov.py: Refactor the code

Collect_cov is too long. The patch splits it into 2 parts in terms
of build_cov, and sim_cov

* README.md: -d debug is deprecated in cov.py. Removing it from README

Add style check

1. verilog_style/build-verible.sh to install the tool
2. tool reports uncorrect syntax error on some files, list them at
verilog_style/exclude_filelist.f and skip checking on them
3. usage
  - install command: ./verilog_style/build-verible.sh
  - style check run command: ./verilog_style/run.sh
riviera 2020.04 beta initial support
Add CHIPS Alliance work group information to the README (#633)
